name: AlwaysExpandProfiles
description: Always expands profile popouts to the full modal

name: AmITyping
description: Shows you if other people can see you typing.

name: Anammox
description: A microbial process that plays an important part in the nitrogen cycle

name: Animalese
description: Plays animal crossing animalese for every message sent (they yap a lot)

name: AtSomeone
description: Mention someone randomly

name: AutoZipper
description: Automatically zips specified file types and folders before uploading to Discord

name: BetterCommands
description: Enhances the command system with miscellaneous improvements.

name: BetterPlusReacts
description: The amount of plus before :emoji: is the message to add it to

name: BlockKeywords
description: Blocks messages containing specific user-defined keywords, as if the user sending them was blocked.

name: BypassPinPrompt
description: Bypass the pin prompt when using the pin functions

name: BlockKrisp
description: Prevent Krisp from loading

name: CleanChannelName
description: remove all emoji and decor shit from channel names

name: CopyStatusUrls
description: Copy the users status url when you right-click it

name: Equissant
description: Crossant every specified amount of clicks :trolley:

name: ForwardAnywhere
description: If a forward fails send it as a normal message also allows nsfw forwards

name: FriendCloud
description: Adds a /friendcloud command to visualize the users you most interact with

commands.name: friendcloud
commands.description: Display user you most interact with in a cloud

name: GuildTagSettings
description: Settings for Guild Tags

name: IgnoreTerms
description: Ignore Discord's new terms of service

name: ImagePreview
description: Hover on message images, avatars, links, and message stickers to show a full preview.

name: InviteDefaults
description: Allows you to edit the default values when creating server invites.

name: KeyboardSounds
description: Adds OperaGX or osu! sound effects when typing on your keyboard.

name: LimitMiddleClickPaste
description: For middle-click autoscroll users, prevents middle-click from making unwanted pastes.

name: MessageBurst
description: Merges messages sent within a time period with your previous sent message if no one else sends a message before you.

name: MoreCommands
description: Adds various fun and useful commands

commands.name: rolldice
commands.description: Roll a die with the specified number of sides

commands.name: flipcoin
commands.description: Flips a coin and returns heads or tails

commands.name: ask
commands.description: Ask a yes/no question and get an answer

commands.name: randomnumber
commands.description: Generates a random number between two values

commands.name: transform
commands.description: Transform your text with the specified option

commands.name: wordcount
commands.description: Counts the number of words in a message

commands.name: countdown
commands.description: Starts a countdown from a specified number

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Pings the bot to check if it's responding

commands.name: morse
commands.description: Translate to or from Morse code

name: MoreKaomoji
description: Adds more Kaomoji to discord. ヽ(´▽`)/

name: NoModalAnimation
description: Remove the 300ms long animation when opening or closing modals

name: NoNitroUpsell
description: Removes ALL of Discord's nitro upsells by tricking the client into thinking you have nitro.

name: NoRPC
description: Disables Discord's RPC server.

name: NoRoleHeaders
description: We are all equal!!

name: PartyMode
description: Allows you to use party mode cause the party never ends ✨

name: PolishWording
description: Tweaks your messages to make them look nicer and have better grammar. See settings

name: ReplyPingControl
description: Control whether to always or never get pinged on message replies, with a whitelist feature

name: SelfForward
description: adds the current channel to the forward list popup

name: Shakespearean
description: Makes every message you send shakespearean

name: ShowResourceChannels
description: shows the channels hidden behind the server resources in the channel list

name: SplitLargeMessages
description: Splits large messages into multiple to fit Discord's message limit.

description: Automatically updates your online status when in a voice channel.

name: StreamingCodecDisabler
description: Disable codecs for streaming of your choice

description: Reads out chat messages with the good ol' Tiktok TTS voice :sob:

description: Add a your own clip length

name: Title
description: Replaces the window title prefix

name: ToggleVideoBind
description: Adds a customizable bind to toggle webcam.

description: osu! RPC with data from tosu

name: UnlimitedAccounts
description: Increases the amount of accounts you can add.

name: VCSupport
description: Wumpus Dance + Support Warnings

name: VoiceJoinMessages
description: Recieve client-side ephemeral messages when your friends join voice channels

description: Changes the first Letter of each Sentence in Message Inputs to Uppercase

description: Rich presence for AudioBookShelf media server

description: Add call timer to all users in a server voice channel.

description: Makes the Noise Suppression Popout switch between None and Krisp instead of Krisp and Standard

name: arRPCBun
description: arRPCBun integration

name: BannersEverywhere
description: Displays banners in the member list

name: BetterActivities
description: Shows activity icons in the member list and allows showing all activities

name: DecodeBase64
description: Decode base64 content of any message and copy the decoded content.

name: BetterAudioPlayer
description: Adds a spectrograph and oscilloscope visualizer to audio attachment players

name: BetterBanReasons
description: Create custom reasons to use in the Discord ban modal, and/or show a text input by default instead of the options.

name: BetterBlockedUsers
description: Allows you to search in blocked users list and makes names selectable in settings.

name: BetterInvites
description: See invites expiration date, view inviter profile and preview discoverable servers before joining by clicking their name

name: BetterQuickReact
description: Improves the quick react buttons in the message context menu.

name: BypassStatus
description: Still get notifications from specific sources when in do not disturb mode. Right-click on users/channels/guilds to set them to bypass do not disturb mode.

name: ChannelBadges
description: Adds badges to channels based on their type

name: ChannelTabs
description: Group your commonly visited channels in tabs, like a browser

name: CharacterCounter
description: Adds a character counter to the chat input

name: ChatButtonsPlus
description: Add custom chat buttons with personalized + messages and SVG icons

name: ClientSideBlock
description: Allows you to locally hide almost all content from any user

name: ClipsEnhancements
description: Add more Clip FPS and duration options, plus RPC tagging!

name: CommandPalette
description: Quickly run actions through a searchable command palette

name: ContentWarning
description: Allows you to specify certain trigger words that will be blurred by default. Hovering/Clicking on the blurred content will reveal it.

name: CopyProfileColors
description: A plugin to copy people's profile gradient colors to clipboard.

name: CopyUserMention
description: Adds a button to copy user's mention on the user context menu, works best with ValidUser.

name: CustomFolderIcons
description: Customize folder icons with any png

name: CustomSounds
description: Customize Discord's sounds.

name: CustomTimestamps
description: Custom timestamps on messages and tooltips

description: Lets you add a custom color to any user, anywhere! Highly recommend to use with typingTweaks and roleColorEverywhere

name: DisableCameras
description: Disables cameras in a call by default

name: DiscordDevBanner
description: Enables the Discord developer banner, in which displays the build-ID

name: DontFilterMe
description: Warns you if your message contains a term in the automod preset list

name: EquicordHelper
description: Used to provide support, fix discord caused crashes, and other misc features.

description: Adds a button next to the inbox button in the channel header that houses Equicord quick actions

name: ExportMessages
description: Allows you to export any message to a file

description: Adds a trash icon to delete channels

description: Jumps to the earliest reply to a message in a channel (lets you follow past conversations more easily).

description: Fixes file extensions by renaming them to a compatible supported format if possible

name: FollowVoiceUser
description: Follow a friend in voice chat.

name: FontLoader
description: Loads any font from Google Fonts

description: Rewrites and filters the quick switcher results to be your most frequent channels

description: Generate FriendCodes to easily add friends

description: Allows you to filter by custom tags in the quick switcher by starting a search with &

description: Makes avatars take up the entire vc tile

description: Discord rich presence for Gensokyo Radio!

description: Allows you to create collections of gifs

description: Displays a user's public GitHub repositories in their profile

description: Adds global badges from other client mods

description: able to hide the chat buttons

description: Changes the home button to a typing indicator if someone in your dms is typing

description: Adds Husk button (check settings to change used emoji)

description: Adds a new tab to settings, to preview all icons

description: Allows you to edit your profile to a random fake person with the click of a button

description: Adds a /imgtogif slash command to create a gif from any image

description: Know who is in a role with the role context menu or /inrole command (read plugin info!)

description: Allows you to navigate the UI with a keyboard.

description: Like MessageLinkEmbed but without taking space

description: Prevents in-call/PiP previews (screenshare, streams, etc) from pausing even if the client loses focus

description: Prevent the quests player from pausing and possibly skip it all together.

description: Enhance your Quest experience with a suite of features, or disable them entirely if they're not your thing.

description: Fixes the annoying "We dropped the magnifying glass!" error.

description: Sekai Stickers built in discord originally from github.com/TheOriginalAyaka

description: Navigate your servers better with a quick search button

description: Embeds TIDAL songs to make them playable in Discord.

description: Shows the local time of users in profiles and message headers
